title: Constructing orderly crystal orientation with a bidirectional coordinator for high efficiency and stable perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6003-6012
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02017K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jaehwi Lee, Yun Seop Shin, Elham Oleiki, Jongdeuk Seo, Jina Roe, Dongmin Lee, Yeonjeong Lee, Taehee Song, Hyungsu Jang, Ji Won Song, Woosuk Lee, Geunsik Lee, Jin Young Kim, Dong Suk Kim
The trifluoroacetate pseudohalide anion, with dual functionalities, is introduced at the buried interface to promote orderly growth. This results in a power conversion efficiency of 25.60% and long-term stability under light exposure.
